description: Time to fix up that old beater.
Tetra tools can be worked until broken, after which they will /c/stop functioning/c/ but /6/not be destroyed/6/ so as to let you repair them.

Repairs are done by /6/cycling through modules/6/ and /6/submitting the material/6/ they are composed of to /b/gain durability/b/. Repairing will also /6/require the appopriate tool/6/. /b/Major modules/b/ (tool heads) are cycled through more often, while others rarely need reparing.
/c/Magically destablized modules additonaly require experince/c/ for repairs.
